import React from "react";
import {
  Box,
  Heading,
  Link,
  Image,
  Text,
  Divider,
  HStack,
  Tag,
  Wrap,
  WrapItem,
  SpaceProps,
  useColorModeValue,
  VStack,
  Grid,
  GridItem,
  Button,
} from "@chakra-ui/react";
import { BsFillAlarmFill } from "react-icons/bs";
import { ImSpoonKnife } from "react-icons/im";
const Recipes = () => {
  return (
    <>
      <Heading as="h1" fontSize="50px">
        Health Japanese Fried Rice
      </Heading>
      <Grid templateColumns="repeat(5, 1fr)" gap={4} marginTop="40px" width="70%">
        <GridItem w="70%" h="10">
          <Text fontWeight="bold">Join Smith</Text>
          <Text>15 March 2022</Text>
        </GridItem>
        <GridItem w="100%" h="10">
          <Text>
            <Text fontWeight="bold" ml="50px">Prep time</Text>
            <Button borderRadius="10px">
              <BsFillAlarmFill />
            </Button>
            15 Minutes
          </Text>
        </GridItem>
        <GridItem w="100%" h="10">
          <Text>
            <Text fontWeight="bold" ml="50px">Cook Time</Text>
            <Button borderRadius="10px">
              <BsFillAlarmFill />
            </Button>
            15 Minutes
          </Text>
        </GridItem>
        <GridItem w="100%" h="10">
          <Button borderRadius="10px" >
            <ImSpoonKnife />
            Chicken
          </Button>
        </GridItem>
      </Grid>
      </>
  );
};

export default Recipes;
